speaker: FENTON
text_entry: ACT V

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: SCENE I. A room in the Garter Inn.

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Enter FALSTAFF and MISTRESS QUICKLY

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Prithee, no more prattling; go. I'll hold. This is

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: the third time; I hope good luck lies in odd

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: numbers. Away I go. They say there is divinity in

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: odd numbers, either in nativity, chance, or death. Away!

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: I'll provide you a chain; and I'll do what I can to

speaker: MISTRESS QUICKLY
text_entry: get you a pair of horns.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Away, I say; time wears: hold up your head, and mince.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Exit MISTRESS QUICKLY

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Enter FORD

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: How now, Master Brook! Master Brook, the matter

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: will be known to-night, or never. Be you in the

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Park about midnight, at Herne's oak, and you shall

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: see wonders.

speaker: FORD
text_entry: Went you not to her yesterday, sir, as you told me

speaker: FORD
text_entry: you had appointed?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: I went to her, Master Brook, as you see, like a poor

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: old man: but I came from her, Master Brook, like a

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: poor old woman. That same knave Ford, her husband,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: hath the finest mad devil of jealousy in him,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Master Brook, that ever governed frenzy. I will tell

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: you: he beat me grievously, in the shape of a

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: woman; for in the shape of man, Master Brook, I fear

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: not Goliath with a weaver's beam; because I know

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: also life is a shuttle. I am in haste; go along

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: with me: I'll tell you all, Master Brook. Since I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: plucked geese, played truant and whipped top, I knew

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: not what 'twas to be beaten till lately. Follow

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: me: I'll tell you strange things of this knave

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Ford, on whom to-night I will be revenged, and I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: will deliver his wife into your hand. Follow.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Strange things in hand, Master Brook! Follow.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Exeunt
